name: RHYTHM RUNNER (INotAntonio)
description:
Rhythm Runner is a platforming rhythm game where you play as a multitude of characters set in different settings. You can play as a lone Spartan fighting through an invading army or an Android running from authorities on the top of rooftops with a neon-filled city backdrop!

Feedback Form: https://forms.gle/p63Ky1EaBiTCeov57
